{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Bitdefender |model=Box |revision=V2
(BT11021000EN) |series=AC1900 |upc=812813014309 |asin=B076FML9B4 |manuf_country=Romania |is_manuf=No |price=250 |fcc_date=10/26/2017 |fcc_id=2AMAP-BT11021000EN |ic_id=22784-BT11021000C |type=wireless router, security appliance |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=NXP |cpu1_model=LS1024A |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=8 GiB |fla1_brand=Kingston |fla1_model=EMMC08G-M325 |fla2=4 |fla2_brand=ISSI |fla2_model=IS25LP032 |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Kingston |ram1_model=D2516EC4BXGGB |ram1_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7615N |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=soldered |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7615N |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=soldered |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8033 |eth_chip3_brand=Atheros |eth_chip3_model=AR8033 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Ultra Fast USB 2.0 Flash Media Controller;SMSC;USB2244;;1;,,, Dual Differential Comparator;TI;LM2903;;1; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=BITDEFENDER BOX |oui=E8:44:7E |oui_eth=E8:44:7E }} {{TagLine|Bitdefender BOX 2 Smart Home CyberSecurity Hub}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.bitdefender.com/box/}} *CPU: [[NXP]] [https://www.nxp.com/products/microcontrollers-and-processors/arm-based-processors-and-mcus/qoriq-layerscape-arm-processors/qoriq-layerscape-1024a-dual-core-communications-processor:LS1024A QorIQ LS1024A] @1.2GHz Dual-core (ARM Cortex-A9) SoC {{See also|Cisco RV340W|Synology RT1900ac}} Intended Use from FCC Test Report:
"Bitdefender BOX 2 Smart Home Hub is used as a security device for home LAN network.
It is placed between WAN and LAN networks. It checks all IP packets passing through it and
looks for malicious contents. It provides protection for wired and wireless LAN networks." ===Reviews=== *[https://www.tomsguide.com/us/bitdefender-box,review-3766.html ''Bitdefender Box 2 (2018)'' on '''TomsGuide'''] *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/bitdefender-box-2-review ''Bitdefender Box 2 review'' on '''Digital Citizen'''] ===Hardware specification=== :Specifications from the review *CPU: [[NXP]] LS1024A @1.2GHz Dual-Core ARM (Cortex-A9) *Storage: 8GB (eMMC 5.1) MLC NAND, 4MB (SPI) Flash *Memory: 1GB (DDR3L) DRAM *Wi-Fi: [[MediaTek]] MT7615N (2x 3T3R) *Wi-Fi Segment: AC1900 (1300 + 600 Mbps) *Number of Antennas: 6; Range: 90 feet *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet Ports *Power: 12V/2A via barrel *Size: 7.0 x 4.5 x 4.5 inches *Weight: 966 grams ==Images== File:Bitdefender Box V2 Top.jpeg|Board top File:Bitdefender Box V2 Bottom.jpeg|Board bottom File:Bitdefender Box V2 LED Top.jpeg|LED Board top File:Bitdefender Box V2 LED Bottom.jpeg|LED Board bottom [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
